name: Just survive the spirited away
description:
Try to avoid spirited away by making full use of options and items. It's the final version

■ Play time
1 hour to 1.5 hours

■ Game introduction text
You, the goddess chosen to cleanse the ruins of Honmaru.
However, the destination is different from the plan, and for some reason it becomes impossible to leave the building.

The ones who lived there were the Touken Danshi who had been treated badly in Black Honmaru.
According to the owner of this honmaru, this is a special honmaru for healing the wounded Touken Danshi.
Let's find a way to escape from Honmaru while deepening exchanges with the Touken Danshi.

"You know, I really shouldn't tell you. You're a good girl, so I'll tell you."

"--You shouldn't be in the guest room."

Every night, I hear footsteps approaching from somewhere.
The hidden shadow of this Honmaru creeps up.

――You are a chosen, “special” human being.

A continuation of the previous work. It is a story after the true end,
If you don't mind spoilers, I think you can play it alone.

This is a secondary creation of Touken Ranbu. I have a dream expression.
There are secondary settings and original settings.
There is a mild grotesque element.
There is a depiction that is not invisible in BL.
Humans such as male judges appear. There are quite a lot of turns.
